p: After a week of growth in adhesion, cells were harvested by trypsinization and total RNA was collected and reverse-transcribed into cDNA. Quantitative RT-PCR analysis was performed to assess the expression of the three germ layers markers: ectoderm ( TUBB, PAX6), mesoderm ( PECAM, CDH5, GATA2, FLK1), and endoderm ( AFP, GATA4).
